Calculate neighborhood disorder score

Source: R/calc_disorder.R
calc_disorder.Rd

Calculate neighborhood disorder score

Usage

calc_disorder(survey_df)

Arguments

survey_df

  • a survey dataframe including SDOH

Value

df_disorder - a dataframe with person_id and disorder score

Examples

calc_disorder(fake_survey_df)
#> # A tibble: 10 × 2
#>    person_id disorder
#>        <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1      1001     3.08
#>  2      1002     2.54
#>  3      1003     2.15
#>  4      1004     1.92
#>  5      1005     2.69
#>  6      1006     2.31
#>  7      1007     2.08
#>  8      1008     2.23
#>  9      1009     2.62
#> 10      1010     2.31
